This is a template for Quarto projects, including:

- data exploration 
- viz/presentation
- manuscript (as a somewhat independent folder with outputs)
- lots of utility functions & "note-to-self" bits in the `./R/*` folder
  - how to add a font
  - how to format for word outputs
  - `renv` setup
  - etc
